_indicator_hololens_short.comment: Text for pill indicator marking hololens video streams in the tray
_indicator_hololens_long.comment: Text for pill indicator marking hololens video streams on the stage
_indicator_mobile_short.comment: Text for pill indicator marking holographic mobile video streams in the tray
_indicator_mobile_long.comment: Text for pill indicator marking holographic mobile video streams on the stage
_toolbar_arrow.comment: Text for button to switch to arrow placement mode
_toolbar_ink.comment: Text for button to switch to ink mode
_toolbar_color_picker.comment: Text for button to switch colors for annotations
_toolbar_color_yellow.comment: Text for button to select yellow annotation color
_toolbar_color_blue.comment: Text for button to select blue annotation color
_toolbar_color_gray.comment: Text for button to select gray annotation color
_toolbar_color_green.comment: Text for button to select green annotation color
_toolbar_color_red.comment: Text for button to select red annotation color
_toolbar_insert_file.comment: Text for button to insert file
_toolbar_undo.comment: Text for button to undo the last annotation action
toolbar_erase_all_current_session: Erase all from current editing session
_toolbar_erase_all_current_session.comme: Text for button to erase all annotations from current edit session
_toolbar_erase_all.comment: Text for button to erase all annotations
_toolbar_start_editing.comment: Starts holographic editing, 'start' indicates an action (verb) in this context
_toolbar_stop_editing.comment: Stops holographic editing, 'stop' indicates an action (verb) in this context
